    • Method Detail

      • getChain

        Chain getChain(String id)
               throws CiliaIllegalParameterException
        Retrieve a mediation chain.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the chain to retrieve
        Returns:
        The required Chain, return null if chain does not exist.
        Throws:
        CiliaIllegalParameterException

      • createEmptyChain

        void createEmptyChain(String id)
                      throws CiliaException
        Create a new initial empty chain chain/
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the new mediation chain.
        Throws:
        CiliaException - if the given chain id already exist.

      • createChain

        void createChain(String chain)
                 throws CiliaException
        Create a new mediation chain contained
        Parameters:
        chain -
        Throws:
        CiliaException

      • loadChain

        void loadChain(String URI)
               throws CiliaException,
                      CiliaParserException
        Load a mediation chain specified on the given URI string. The resource must be in XML format.
        Parameters:
        URI - The URI where the chain is located
        Throws:
        CiliaException - If Chain id exist.
        CiliaParserException - If the XML containing the mediation chain is not well formed.

      • updateChain

        boolean updateChain(String id,
                  String... instructions)
                    throws CiliaException
        It modifies the given mediation chain by using a set of reconfiguration instructions.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the chain to modify
        instructions - The set of instructions to which will modify the mediation chain.
        Returns:
        true if the reconfiguration is successful, false if the chain does not exist.
        Throws:
        CiliaException - if there is any error on the instructions.

      • copyComponent

        void copyComponent(String chainId,
                 String source,
                 String destination)
                   throws CiliaException
        Copy the information of an existing component to another one.
        Parameters:
        chainId - The chain Identification.
        source - The id of the component source.
        destination - The id of the component destination.
        Throws:
        CiliaException

      • replaceComponent

        void replaceComponent(String chainId,
                    String from,
                    String to)
                      throws CiliaException
        Replace one component for another and copy his data.
        Parameters:
        chainId - The chain to modify.
        from - the original component.
        to - The destination component
        Throws:
        CiliaException

      • deleteChain

        boolean deleteChain(String id)
                    throws CiliaIllegalParameterException,
                           CiliaIllegalStateException,
                           BuilderException,
                           BuilderPerformerException
        Delete a mediation chain.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the chain to be deleted
        Returns:
        true if chain is successful deleted, false if it does not exist.
        Throws:
        CiliaIllegalStateException
        CiliaIllegalParameterException
        BuilderException
        BuilderPerformerException
